mapper.sql: ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PLAN_ITEM_NO, ITEM_NO, DISP_DATE, REACH_TIME, REACH_TIME_TYPE, MATNR, UNIT, QTY, PRICE, AMT, REMAIN_AMT, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,GIFT_QTY,PROMOTION_FLAG
mapper.select: select d.ORDER_NO, d.ORDER_DATE, d.PLAN_ITEM_NO, d.ITEM_NO, d.DISP_DATE,(CASE dayofweek(d.DISP_DATE) WHEN 1 THEN '星期日' WHEN 2 THEN '星期一' WHEN 3 THEN '星期二' WHEN 4 THEN '星期三' WHEN 5 THEN '星期四' WHEN 6 THEN '星期五' WHEN 7 THEN '星期六' END ) WEEKLY, d.REACH_TIME, d.REACH_TIME_TYPE, d.MATNR, UNIT, d.QTY, d.PRICE, d.AMT, d.REMAIN_AMT, d.STATUS, d.CREATE_AT, d.CREATE_BY, d.CREATE_BY_TXT, d.LAST_MODIFIED, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, p.MATNR_TXT MATNR_TXT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item d , t_md_mara p ,t_preorder o where d.MATNR = p.MATNR and o.ORDER_NO = d.ORDER_NO and o.SALES_ORG = p.SALES_ORG and d.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.DISP_DATE,d.REMAIN_AMT desc

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by DISP_DATE desc , REMAIN_AMT asc

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (STATUS = '10'
or STATUS = '20'
or STATUS = '30'
)
and (STATUS = '20'
or STATUS = '10'
or STATUS = '30'
)
and (STATUS = '30'
or STATUS = '20'
or STATUS = '10'
)
order by DISP_DATE asc

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by DISP_DATE asc , REMAIN_AMT desc

select d.ORDER_NO, d.ORDER_DATE, d.PLAN_ITEM_NO, d.ITEM_NO, d.DISP_DATE, d.REACH_TIME, d.REACH_TIME_TYPE, d.MATNR, d.UNIT, d.QTY, d.PRICE, d.AMT, d.REMAIN_AMT, d.STATUS, d.CREATE_AT, d.CREATE_BY, o.ADRESS_NO CREATE_BY_TXT, d.LAST_MODIFIED, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY,o.emp_no LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,d.GIFT_QTY from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item d left join t_preorder o on o.order_no = d.order_no where d.disp_date = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=DATE} and o.emp_no = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.reach_time_type = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.status != "30" and d.status != "20"
mapper.insert: insert into t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item (ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PLAN_ITEM_NO, ITEM_NO, DISP_DATE, REACH_TIME, REACH_TIME_TYPE, MATNR, UNIT, QTY, PRICE, AMT, REMAIN_AMT, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_DATE,
PLAN_ITEM_NO,
ITEM_NO,
DISP_DATE,
REACH_TIME,
REACH_TIME_TYPE,
MATNR,
UNIT,
QTY,
PRICE,
AMT,
REMAIN_AMT,
STATUS,
CREATE_AT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_BY_TXT,
LAST_MODIFIED,
LAST_MODIFIED_BY,
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,
GIFT_QTY,
PROMOTION_FLAG,
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{giftQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{promotionFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REACH_TIME = #{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REACH_TIME_TYPE = #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAIN_AMT = #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}
and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REACH_TIME_TYPE = #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAIN_AMT = #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PLAN_ITEM_NO = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select i.DISP_DATE, i.MATNR,m.MATNR_TXT MATNR_TXT,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,m.BASE_UNIT UNIT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara m on i.MATNR = m.MATNR LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR where 1=1 and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.QTY > 0 and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) and m.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR ORDER BY i.DISP_DATE desc

SELECT /*IFNULL(i.PROMOTION_FLAG,'')*/ i.PROMOTION_FLAG FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.GIFT_QTY is not NULL and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and (i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE} or i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE}) and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG

select i.MATNR,SUM(i.GIFT_QTY) QTY,PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 AND i.GIFT_QTY is not null and i.GIFT_QTY >0 and o.PREORDER_STAT !='20' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ( i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} or i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG,i.MATNR ORDER BY i.DISP_DATE desc

SELECT t.MATNR,SUM(t.QTY) QTY FROM ( select i.MATNR,SUM(i.QTY) QTY from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara m on i.MATNR = m.MATNR LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' AND i.GIFT_QTY is null and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) and m.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL
SELECT i.MATNR,SUM(i.INCRE_QTY) QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1
and i.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR UNION ALL SELECT i.MATNR,SUM(i.QTY) QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.FLAG = 2 and i.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
)t where 1=1 and t.MATNR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t.MATNR

SELECT i.PROMOTION_FLAG FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.GIFT_QTY is not NULL and i.DISP_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND i.STATUS = '20' and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG

SELECT di.MATNR,SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY,di.CONFIRM_MATNR,p.PROMOTION PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item i on i.ORDER_NO = di.ORG_ORDER_NO and i.ITEM_NO = di.ORG_ITEM_NO and i.MATNR = di.MATNR LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item p on di.ORG_ITEM_NO = p.ITEM_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on di.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 AND di.GIFT_FLAG is NOT null AND ti.STATUS = '20' and di.CONFIRM_QTY>0 and di.MATNR!=di.CONFIRM_MATNR and di.REASON = '10' and di.REPLACE_REASON = '10' and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ti.DISP_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY di.MATNR,di.CONFIRM_MATNR,p.PROMOTION UNION ALL SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR,SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY,di.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR,p.PROMOTION PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item i on i.ORDER_NO = di.ORG_ORDER_NO and i.ITEM_NO = di.ORG_ITEM_NO and i.MATNR = di.MATNR LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on di.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item p on di.ORG_ITEM_NO = p.ITEM_NO where 1=1 AND di.GIFT_FLAG is NOT null AND ti.STATUS = '20' and di.MATNR = di.CONFIRM_MATNR and di.CONFIRM_QTY>0 and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ti.DISP_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY di.MATNR,p.PROMOTION

SELECT t.MATNR,SUM(t.QTY) QTY, t.CONFIRM_MATNR FROM ( select (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR,SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY, di.CONFIRM_MATNR from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order disp on di.ORDER_NO = disp.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and disp.`STATUS` = '20' and di.MATNR=di.CONFIRM_MATNR AND di.GIFT_FLAG is null and disp.DISP_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY di.CONFIRM_MATNR
UNION ALL
select di.MATNR,SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY,di.CONFIRM_MATNR from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order disp on di.ORDER_NO = disp.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and disp.`STATUS` = '20' and di.MATNR!=di.CONFIRM_MATNR and di.REASON = '10' and di.REPLACE_REASON = '10' AND di.GIFT_FLAG is null and disp.DISP_DATE =#{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY di.MATNR,di.CONFIRM_MATNR
UNION ALL
SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR ,SUM(i.INCRE_QTY) QTY,i.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.INCRE_QTY!=null and i.INCRE_QTY!=0 and i.ORDER_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR ,SUM(i.QTY) QTY, i.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.FLAG = 2 and i.ORDER_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR,i.QTY,i.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR FROM t_mst_inside_sal_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_mst_inside_sal_order o on i.INS_ORDER_NO = o.INS_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order disp on o.DISP_ORDER_NO = disp.ORDER_NO WHERE 1=1 and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and disp.DISP_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY i.MATNR )t where 1=1 AND t.QTY>0 and t.CONFIRM_MATNR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t.CONFIRM_MATNR,t.MATNR

SELECT i.MATNR,i.UNIT,SUM(i.GIFT_QTY) QTY,i.PRICE,a.MATNR_TXT FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara a on i.MATNR = a.MATNR and a.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} where i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and i.GIFT_QTY is not null GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL
SELECT i.MATNR,i.UNIT,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,i.PRICE,a.MATNR_TXT FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara a on i.MATNR = a.MATNR and a.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} where 1=1 and i.STATUS !='30' and a.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} and i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and i.GIFT_QTY IS NULL GROUP BY i.MATNR
